place_description:
We are a Vietnamese cafe and bakery that specializes in Banh Mi sandwiches. Our bread is made fresh in-house every day to ensure that you will always get the best quality. In addition to bread, our ingredients for the banh mi, as well as our baked goods, are all made from scratch.
We also serve coffee, which is organic and roasted locally here in Charlotte.

reviews_data.review_text: Great food, everything very fresh, reasonable prices. I will be back.

Best banh mi in Charlotte. Fresh ingredients- the bread is magical. The pistachio latte is also incredibly delicious. I wish they were closer to NoDa but we make the drive a couple of times a month because we crave this place!
The best coffee and you should try the espresso lemonade !
The best coffee shop for miles around. A+ coffee and A+ pastries, bread, and sandwiches. A Must Stop joint!
Great coffee and pastries. No more Starbucks for me!
Terrific all around

EVERYTHING IS PHENOMENAL! Every Banh Mi I've tried is so fresh when it comes out and the coffee is handcrafted every single time. I can't get enough of this place! Try every baked item you can, you'll thank me
Excellent food. Never refilled their water dispenser.
This place is great honestly, but you better come with time and patience. They are so inefficient on the back that your coffee or pastry take ages
Excellent fresh pastries. Wonderful customer service
Wow I was very impressed by the banh mi and I've been to Vietnam. I would definitely recommend.

First time stopping in, great first impression. The cashier was extremely helpful when I told him it was my first time. He explained the menu and their best-sellers. I got the banh mi sandwich with beef and a hot Vietnamese coffee. Great experience, will be returning.
Delicious Banh Mi and Vietnamese coffee.  I ordered the tofu banh mi on fresh bread and a Vietnamese coffee with salted cream.  The owners are super nice too!  Highly recommended!

The tofu Banh mi is literally the best sandwich I've ever had! It's perfect every time. The house made baguette is fluffy, warm, and amazing. The danishes and coffees are delicious. It's become one of my favorite places in Charlotte!
I work close to this place and had become the place to go to when I don't bring my lunch, it's delicious, the bread !! Is incredible, highly recommended

I stumbled upon this restaurant when I went to ups a few months back and soo glad I did, I keep going back and anytime anyone mentions a bahn mi I think of this place, I've tried bahn mi from other places and none compare to the ones here. My mouth literally waters every time  and their coffee equally amazing  . Staff always very attentive and friendly !
Everything is so good and very cozy atmosphere.
Delicious drinks and food all around. Super cozy interior. Highly recommend!
Very nice interior, went with a group of 4 and got a coffee and pastry! Very tasty and authentic selection!

Feb 2025 -

An absolute gem 

Our plan was to just get coffee but ended up getting the crispy pork belly and cold cut banh mi.

Super!

We will be back for sure

9.3/10
Up there with the best banh mi dac biet in the city

WOW I shouldn't be surprised because of the reviews but I was. The food was so fresh and tasted amazing. We also tried Vietnamese coffee for the first time and it was to die for. Please give this place a chance it's so worth it! I will be coming back quite often.

Food and coffee are both incredible! Had the grilled chicken banh mi and Vietnamese coffee. The bread was crisp and fresh and the chicken was delicious. Everyone there is extremely friendly, service was great. The space is very cozy and comfortable.

Zen Lesson Failed: A Matcha Saga

So, here I am--very pregnant, with a massive belly--deciding to treat myself to a lovely matcha and some pastries. I walk into a cafe and, miracle of miracles, there's no line! I think, Wow, this is going to be quick.

I order three desserts and three matcha drinks. The barista nods, and I relax. But then... 25 minutes pass. Twenty-five minutes! Apparently, this man has taken it upon himself to train my patience in preparation for labor. I stand there, watching him like a hawk, silently willing him to hurry up.

At some point, I start wondering--did he send a group of celestial virgins to the matcha fields to hand-pick the freshest leaves just for me? Because I see no other reason for this delay.

Then, his friend walks in. And this guy, without a second thought, puts my order on hold to casually chit-chat, as if I don't even exist! That's when I officially lose my Zen. No more inner peace, no more joyful anticipation. Instead, I hiss through gritted teeth, "Long. VERY long."

I am never coming back here. But I have to admit--the matcha was heavenly, and the pastries were absolute perfection. Probably infused with the fiery energy of all the burning asses of frustrated customers forced to wait 25 minutes for their tea.

Wishing you all peace and patience. Mine has officially run out. No one bothered to apologize for their attitude, even though the prices weren't exactly cheap. I paid around $45 for my order.

a great place to enjoy a great coffee and have a snack.

it's limited in space and get loud when everyone is talking, so, i wish for the grow of this business, maybe space out more the tables from each other or reduce the amount of tables.

outside of that the food is great and the coffee too.

unique space with great music and calm vibes.
Real Good FRESH food. Only negative is I don't have them where I live. Absolutely live this place. I came here 3 time in the 2 days I was in town.
Best Banh mi in town! Staff is always friendly and cheerful! Highly recommended!
I love this place. Food is awesome and staff is very friendly. Alex you rock!

This place is superb! Delicious pork belly banh mi made with freshly baked crunchy Vietnamese rolls. They absolutely nailed it! Best I have had since leaving Australia. I just wish it wasn't a 2 hour drive from me.
The number five pork belly sandwich was fantastic. I also had the strawberry and cream cheese pastry. Everything was fresh and brought to my table. Will be coming back.

Came about 630pm.  Maybe that is too late in the day, but the bread was so hard and dry it felt like it was dehydrated.  The bottom half of the sandwich was actually ok, but the top was inedible.  The pickled veg wasn't enough moisture to save it.  Could have used more sauce, I couldn't find any mayo.  Maybe on a good day this has potential, maybe find out when the bread is actually fresh.
A really cozy place with great coffee and food!
We love the Bahn Mi sandwiches! They are always so good. The bread is my favorite part- they bake it fresh there everyday.  My husband loves their pastries too!
Delicious banh mi and REAL espresso-based coffees, along with exquisite Vietnamese versions thereof. Highly recommended!
The Bahn Mi is so tasty!!! Highly recommended
Wonderful pistachio latte and pastry! We will be back!
This place slaps. Great pastries, great coffee, locally owned and run.

Great great place with awesome food and a very cozy atmosphere that matches the vibe of the food and drink served.

Had a Vietnamese coffee with salted cream cold and it was excellent.  Loved the salted cream addition as it provided a bit more depth to the flavor of the dessert type drink

Followed that with a grilled pork Bahn Mi and it was one of the best I've ever had.  Their homemade bread really made a difference with how good the texture of it was.  Loved how they pickle their veggies that go on it as well and of course the meat was excellent along with it.  As a whole bite it really covered everything you could want in a Bahn Mi.

To finish i had the apple turnover and it too was excellent.  They really know what they are doing with anything bread or dough related.  Super flaky with excellent apple flavor really rounded out the meal nicely.

I wish they had a bit comfier chairs on their tables but that's a very small thing that doesn't take away from the place
Small cafe but awesome fresh pastries and Banhmi Sandwiches! Home made fresh baguettes. Some specialty coffees

Best Banh Mi and Lattes ever! I love this place, I brought my laptop to sit and do work while drinking a pistachio latte and I feel like I'm in a studio ghibli or hallmark movie it is SO cozy and cute in here. Recently became a vegetarian and the tofu banh mi is perfect! So warm and perfect spice level.
Wish it was bigger so i could bring my group of friends
Everything is good. If you're in the area definitely try it. Seating is limited but you can get stuff to go.
Lovely atmosphere, of course one of my favorite coffee shop.
Great place.
Excellent food and service!
Everything is fantastic, the food is fresh. Probably one of the few places with an authentic flavor. The only "bad" thing about this place is being kind of small
Just purchased a baguette used for Banh Mi sandwiches and it was very good
Don't live in Charlotte anymore but I sure miss this place! The coffee, pastries, buns and sandwiches! I can't wait to come back!

They have 2 sizes of Vietnamese coffee... You think you want the big one, but the regular is just fine!
So yummy. Delish banh mi sammie's as well.
Iced Matcha Rose & bulgogi beef bahn mi was delicious! Will be back!
The pastries here are really good. Highly recommend.

I have been going here since they opened. Consistently they have been serving the freshest food. Everything is housemade. They have many seasonal items. The owners are so kind and friendly. I have tried everything on the menu and love it all! Highly recommend!
Consistently excellent food and coffee. They take their time carefully crafting your food and beverages so please allow 5-10 more minutes than you would a Starbucks or dunkin.

Food was very sweet, not very authentic. We vot a classic pork bahn mi and the chicken curry. Took over 10 minutes to get a to-go box. Staff seems pretty out of it. Its a cute place, just dont get food here
Forever obsessed with this place and everything they have to offer! The Vietnamese coffee is nice and strong

I was in the area doing business in a nearby suite when I noticed the sign that said caramel flan. Flan is one of my favorite desserts and I've found that it's not always made the same way.

It wasn't very busy when I stopped in and I was able to get my flan right away. I enjoyed the flan; may have to return and try their coffee.
Cozy place, great taste and awesome service. don't forget to try the pistachio latte.
Alex is always friendly and provides great service. The coffee is delicious and so is everything else on their menu.
Vietnamese coffee and sandwich were incredible
Always fast, fresh and super friendly! Everything is fresh daily. Bread is amazing and the Banh Mi is out of this world!
Amazing Pork Belly and Chicken Bahn Mi and then equally wonderful Vietnamese coffee. Best Bahn Mi I have had in a long time!

1000000/10 always recommended for sure!
I have tried almost every thing they have here from banh mi, to the drinks, to the desserts and every time I can't help but feeling so amazed by how beautiful and nearly everything is served, I can tell how much love and effort they put into this restaurant and the food,  the food quality is always the same and is sooooo soooo good. The service can be slow sometimes because they're family owned but I don't mind waiting because I know my food is going to come out perfect every single time.
My go to meal is: cold cut (special) banh mi + iced Vietnamese coffee with sea salt foam + the cheese and hot dog (or leek and Parmesan or cheese danish or anything really, all the small bites are all good), try them and thank me later.
I live almost an hour away from them but I still drive there multiple times a week to have my banh mi fix. At this point I think I should just do a binding vows with them lol

Just stopped for two chicken banh mi. Asked for no jalapenos. Got to the park and sure enough they were on there. And of course anywhere they touched couldn't be eaten. Very disappointed. Just updated this review because I went back a few days later and the owner approached me and apologized for our experience and didn't try to explain it away. Great customer service.
Our favorite local cafe!

2 day in a row...food here is amazing
The food is fresh
Really great food for a reasonable price

Absolutely love this place and the employees'l! They are so kind and welcoming every time. Love coming in here for the sweets and sandwiches. Bulgogi beef is the best! Lets not mention everything is fresh!! Im a forever customer
Amazing food, coffee and customer service

The cinnamon roll was amazing, it truly felt like something I would cook at home from scratch.

The espresso was average though,  too watery  for my taste (I worked for specialty coffee shops, so I know what a good espresso tastes like)

The coffee is great, way better quality than big chains and costs less. Also, pastries are made from scratch!
But plan your time, it took them about 10min to prepare one drink and there was just one person before me((

Coffee was strong and not overly sweet. The Banh mi was incredible. The baguette is crispy and blended wonderfully with the savory pork and pickled veggies. I frequent the triad area and this is one of the best I've had. They also have a plethora of other baked goods that I will definitely try next time.

The bread is baked fresh in house and the banh mi is delicious!! It's better than banh mi Saigon in GSO - reminds me of Eden center in VA. The Vietnamese iced coffee is legit too (a lil too bitter for me personally but that just means I need to ask for extra condensed milk next time!) get the #1. You won't regret it.
Cute and delicious! Highly recommend
Banh MI are excellent and I love the Vietnamese coffee! Ice or hot!

Absolutely loved everything about this place! It's the perfect combination of my favorite food: banh mi, bakery, and coffee. The cold cut banh mi and pork banh mi are absolute must-tries. The banh mi bread is freshly made in the store, crispy and warm! Their coffee is excellent too--I especially loved the espresso lemonade, which is so refreshing and flavorful, perfect for summer! I also tried a few of their baked goods; the pineapple puff is really good!
A tad expensive but the food is great, Vietnamese coffee is lovely and the chicken bahn mi was tasty

This place definitely exceeded my expectations. I went with a group so I was able to try multiple drinks and they were all delicious. Great atmosphere, great music, the staff were super friendly, and the coffee was one of the best i've had in Charlotte. I'd highly recommend this cafe!
That bread is amazing !!!! We bought a couple of baguettes and they are just delicious ! We are absolutely coming back to try their other stuff !
Excellent quality bahn mi, and friendly service. I will look forward to trying the other items on the menu,
Best coffee I ever had in Charlotte!

I was looking for a place to get a quick coffee and found this hidden gem in a strip mall. They had a wide variety of different teas and coffee that sounded very interesting. The owner was helpful with the many questions I had about the menu. I decided to go with matcha rosa latte. It was tasty with a hint of rose flavor.
Now, for the big  wham, the Banh mi are amazing. The bread was freshly made that day. The baguette was soft with a nice crunchy taste, and the pork was so tender. Dang, it was so good we ordered some to take home. The place was packed with people at each table. The staff was friendly and thanked us several times for coming in. I came home telling my family about this place, good service and good food.
This Bo Nuong beef sandwich is . Super chill vibe with great service. They never miss.
This is good, nice and clean bathroom very nice
Amazing!. Great coffee and bahn mi sandwiches. The bread is fresh amd so are the ingredients
Coffee and the beef Banh Mi were DELICIOUS! Not the fastest of service but it's a very calming space to hang in. Definitely recommended!

The coffee is exceptional--rich, aromatic, and perfectly brewed. For those looking for something refreshing, their lemonade is top-notch, offering a perfect balance of tartness and sweetness.

The ambiance of the cafe is cozy and inviting, with a variety of games like chess and puzzles available to keep you entertained. It's a great spot to relax, unwind, and enjoy some quality time, whether you're alone or with friends.

The staff here truly make the experience special. In particular, the lady at the desk was incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that every customer feels welcomed and well taken care of.

If you're in the area, 220C Banh Mi & Coffee is definitely worth a visit for their excellent beverages, great atmosphere, and outstanding service.
I come here often. Great food and drinks, friendly staff!

Very impressed with 220'C "banh mi".  On point for toasted/crispy outer layer, juicy inside, and fresh meats.  The flavor is balanced and thick.

I was raised on banh mi.  Typically scour new places in Charlotte metro and other cities when travel.

I ordered the cold cuts (special), grilled pork, pastries, and flan.  I was amazed of the bread/flavor/meat combination (good quality & value).  The bread, meat and sauce were actually hot, which is quite rare for my experience.  The dough is made in-house daily.  Really appreciate restaurants that specialize in one or two menu items and rock it.

There's flan and drinks.  Hopefully get to try "bo kho" and "cari ga" next time.  My new go-to banh mi place.

Absolutely! HStep aside, world, because 220degC has officially perfected the art of caffeination and carb celebration! If you're in the mood for a coffee experience that makes you want to break into a happy dance, this is your spot. Their coffee is like a warm hug from your most caffeine-obsessed friend - perfectly brewed and packed with flavor.

Now, onto the banh mi sandwiches. Picture this: crispy pork that's so crunchy, it's like a piggy orchestra playing a symphony in your mouth. The veggies? Fresh and crunchy enough to make a salad jealous. And don't even get me started on the bread - it's like they found the secret to baking clouds.

But it's not just about the food; the staff here could charm the socks off a snake. They're friendly, efficient, and they actually smile like they mean it. And here's the kicker - they have an app for ordering takeout that's so easy, even your technologically-challenged grandma could use it.

So, if you're looking for a place where the coffee flows like a river of liquid gold and the banh mi are a party in your mouth, 220degC is your new happy place. Trust me, you'll leave with a belly full of goodness and a heart full of joy. Five stars and a high-five to 220degC!"

I love this place. I go here all the time, and every time enjoy my meal. From their coffee to the in house baked goods. This place is amazing. Can't go wrong with the Vietnamese coffee, and any of the Banh mi sandwich's.

I also never thought I would enjoy a peach matcha or just matcha as much as I did here.

Their beef stew is also delicious.

This is my go to place for a quick delicious bite or when I went just to grab a drink and pastry for breakfast. Everything I have tried here was fresh and absolutely delicious. The staff is always friendly and polite.

Delicious crispy banh mi.
Good place to work on projects.

We really loved our visit to 220C Banh Mi & Coffee in Charlotte! We visited on a Friday evening and it wasn't busy.

We got the Pistachio Latte, the Grilled Chicken Banh Mi sandwiches, and the Passionfruit Lemonade. It might've been the best latte I've ever had. The taste of pistachio hit the spot. The sandwiches were freshly prepared with all the fresh ingredients, and the lemonade was wonderful as well.

The staff were kind and polite. The restroom in the back of the store was clean.

I'll be back to try more of their drinks and food items. The bakery items on display looked delicious too!

It's in a strip mall, so there's a lot of parking available. I can't recommend this place enough.

Yooooo, my boss told me to check this place out and I'm glad I did. The atmosphere inside is warming and the employees are fantastic. They have great Vietnamese coffee, great food, and some tasty pastries.

If you're ever on Monroe or Sardis road in Matthews you gotta stop by this place. You will not be disappointed.
Great Sandwiched

We have been coming here probably once a month for over a year now -- it's one of our favorite little spots! My fiance and I always get hot lattes, which are wonderful.

For food, we always get a chicken banh mi and a pork belly banh mi, and then share the chicken curry soup for dipping.  The banh mis are filled with veggies and are so fresh, and the curry (not pictured due to it being seasonal) is SO flavorful. It's a phenomenal combination!

Every time we come in, the staff is always so kind and sweet, and provide great service.

We love it here and will continue to come back!!
Krispy pork belly banh mi Is a absolute must try. Vietnamese coffee and ice lattes are amazing. Service is great nice environment
Stopped in for a cuppa joe - good brew!
Si quieres un buen desayuno con el mejor ambiente y los mejores cafe y comida , este es el lugar perfecto

We ordered spring rolls, Vietnamese coffee, and pork Banh Mi. Overall we enjoyed it. My impression is they may lack a full kitchen but could be wrong. The food was very good, just the meat lacked grilling like I am used to seeing in Banh Mi. Otherwise the flavor was spot on.

It's always a pleasure to come and get the banh mi at 220C. The food is amazing and fresh, the portions are great, the place itself has an amazing vibe, and the price is really reasonable. I've been here three separate times and it's been consistently great, I am very impressed by 220C Banh Mi.
Good

I'm mean WOW! Chefs kiss. BEST BANH MI I've had. Fresh and flavorful today was my first time visiting and ordered the chicken and I literally want to go back and order another lol. Amazing service so friendly. Oh and the coffee was really good! I will definitely be back! 10/10

They really made me an awesome plain Iced Latte.  Their hot dog and cheese pastry was also outstanding! Also they're one of the few places with Stevia as a sweetener.
I'll be back to try more items on the menu when im in the area.
Great spot!
Great food and great service! I highly recommend
A fantastic small cafe with great coffee, pastries and banh mi.

My coworker told me their food and drinks was very good. So I got myself a Taro Latte and it was very yummy. The inside of this place is so cute. You can tell they took a long time how they want their business to look and it shows. Staff are super friendly. I will go back and try another drink for sure.

Really cute place! I had been wanting some Vietnamese hot coffee for awhile. Googled, and this place came up with high reviews for that. I also love banh mi! Got the coffee and a tofu banh mi for breakfast. Both very good! I like the tofu at crispy banh mi slightly better, but this was still super good and had great bread. You can also buy the bread here, large single loaves. The viet hot coffee is the best I've had around Charlotte. Warm atmosphere and service. I think the lady was working by herself and she was still so kind and fast while it was getting busier around 930 Sunday. Nice seating area for groups or singles; cute table activities area for kids. Highly recommend!

I can't believe how good this place was. The vibe, the welcoming and smiling staff, the food ... all totally on point. The coffees- we tried hot and cold- were each THE BEST we've had in Charlotte...no contest. No paper cups here if you eat in... coffee only as it should be served:  in real mugs on saucers with decorative art in the foam that holds while you drink it. The bahn mi sandwich was light and tasty like it should be- loved the bulgogi one. The bread was beyond anything I've found locally. I can't say enough to express my delight with this place... a hidden gem in Matthews that you NEED to experience!!

Vietnamese Coffee (hot) that has like 4 shots of Espresso and condensed milk was very sweet and tasty, on the heavier side, tad bitter towards the end as expected in something this strong...
Beef Bulgogi Bun was just going in the oven, so got it steaming hot 15 mins later as I was through most of my coffee, and is sweet on the outside with the flavors on the inside in the marinated beef - worth trying at least once.

This place is an awesome gem. No need to go to Vietnam to experience authentic flavors and fresh meals.

Banh Mi with tofu and egg was perfect crispiness to the freshly baked on a toasted hero baguette. Pickled vegetables were crunchy and flavorful.

Both the Thai tea and Taro lattes, hot with oatmilk were so delicious and surprisingly well balanced with rich taste.

Having lived in NYC for 20+ years, moving to Charlotte has made us explore more authentic food places and this one is now one of our favorites. Well worth the visit!
I absolutely love this gem of a restaurant!! The coffee is fantastic (I love the pistachio latte), the Bahn Mi is so fresh, and the staff are super friendly. :) cannot recommend enough
Bathroom is gross on a Sunday at 11:30. If the bathroom is dirty I can imagine the kitchen. The meat was poor quality.
Good coffee!
The beef bulgogi is a 10/10 and a major plus is to have it as a breakfast item with egg.

Nice and chill hangout spot to enjoy some delicious banh mi! I ordered the "Our Special" banh mi, a Vietnamese iced coffee, and a bulgogi beef bun. The bread had a really nice crunchy exterior and it was nice and soft on the inside. One thing that really stood out to me on this sandwich was the pickled daikon and carrots. They were a little more sweet and acidic than I have had from other places which I loved! The other ingredients were fresh and they made their bread in house which I appreciated.

I wasn't a huge fan of the Vietnamese iced coffee but this was just a preference thing. Nothing about it was bad, but I just don't have the palate for it. Mine also wasn't super sweet either, but I believe you can ask them to crank up the sweetness if you would like it to be sweeter.

As I was walking out, they were restocking their baked goods shelf, and I was able to snag a bulgogi beef bun! This made me so happy as I had wanted to try one of these after seeing photos of it from other reviews. The bread was super pillowy and the meat inside was extremely flavorful. Enjoying this bun was a great way to end this food experience, and I left happy and full.

We walked in a little after 10 to find this place still bustling! That's a good sign to us, because it means that this is a local favorite. AND ITS AMAZING! Truly, the coffee is perfect and the food is so delicious.
The best coffee in Charlotte. Hands down.
The best coffee and sandwiches i have ever had!!! Ever! Hands down excellent quality.
Excellent small cafe serving amazing bahn mi!
Amazing coffee and delicious food, there is always a place to seat, and the design is so cute. Thanks to all the staff members, they are always amazing and truly welcoming. Bang mi is my new love :)
Get the blueberry cream cheese pastry with a latte. You won't regret it
I can't get enough of this place! If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. Everything about it is great! Highly recommend any of their banh mi sandwiches, next up is the coffee!
literally the best banh mi i've ever had. if being in love with food was a real thing, this place will get you there
I like this coffee shop. Nice vibe. Good lattes. Lo-fi beats. I'll be back
Best coffee and sandwiches
Great food, great staff! 2 thumbs up!!
I'm here multiple times a week! The tofu Banh Mi is amazing along with all their other pastries.

Really excellent Bahn mi! We also got the curry and were really impressed. It's a bit of a hike from Charlotte, but it's worth the drive!

Make sure to a bring baguette home with you!

The coffee is strong and tasty.
The baguette, and pastries are great. The bulgogi bahn mi is my favorite.
I always stop by when I'm in the area, the staff is very friendly and polite.
The Vietnamese coffee was really good,  the atmosphere was cozy.  I'm glad I found this place that wasn't on my radar... It's a welcome change to the Starbucks domination!
Staff is amazing. Coffee is great. Food is even better. Stop in, you won't regret it.
Highly recommend!
The best Banh Mi in the entire Southeast. They know what they're doing!
Great coffee and friendly atmosphere!
The Vietnamese coffee with salty cream was so good! It was like eating a buttery salty cookie. The tofu banh mi was a bit on the dry side (probably gonna add mayo next time) but the bread was 10/10
Fantastic sandwich, bread is incredible.Owners are very nice.Willbe back soon.
Wonderful place to grab a bite to eat and have a super cup of awesome coffee.
The Taro latte is amazing!!!! Can't recommend enough!
The best banh mi sandwich in Charlotte. Drink selection is awesome, coffee is great, especially the Vietnamese coffee.
10/10 obsessed with this place. Best coffee in south Charlotte!
Delightful service and excellent banh mi. The bread was excellent!

220C Banh Mi and Sweets is a culinary gem that transcends the boundaries of a typical Banh Mi shop. From the moment you step in, the warm embrace of Vietnamese culture envelops you. The passion for food, honed through generations, resonates in each meticulously crafted dish.

The menu at 220C Banh Mi and Sweets is a symphony of flavors, each dish a testament to the culinary expertise honed over years of family tradition. The Banh Mi, in particular, is a masterpiece - a harmonious blend of textures and tastes that transports you to the vibrant streets of Vietnam.

Beyond the delectable cuisine, the ambiance exudes a welcoming warmth, inviting patrons to linger and savor not just the food but the entire experience. It's a place where heritage meets hospitality, creating an atmosphere that feels like an extension of one's own family.

In the realm of Vietnamese cuisine, 220C Banh Mi and Sweets stands out as  the best Banh Mi shop in Charlotte  For those seeking an authentic, delicious food come visit .

220C is simply the best!  5+ stars.  We hosted a post-wedding party for 100 family & friends and as a "late night" treat we served 4 trays of Pork Banh Mi #8.  They were such a huge hit, and the banh mi stayed so good for a few days as we finished the trays.  Excellent food and wonderful team.
Such a cute cafe and great service
He's coffee in Charlotte

I look forward to every Saturday morning with my cold or hot Vietnamese Coffee at Banh Mi! Such a nice space that makes customers feel comfortable if you're picking up or enjoying your drink and a pastry, on top of well-made specialty coffees.
One of my favorites for coffee or lunch. Love the food, coffee, and staff. They never miss!
Love this place! The food and drinks are so yummy! The pastries are delicious and the vibes are perfect

Stop by and found this gem in the area. This has one of the best banh mi I ever had and I'm from Houston, TX. The bread on the banh mi is fresh and crisp. I selected the cold cut banh mi which is more traditional and it was the best I have ever eaten. I am definitely going back a few times before I head back home this week to Houston. The vietnamese coffee is also fresh and made to order! Will be back to try other items on the menu!
Great coffee. Great atmosphere. Friendly and considerate staff. Great Great food. Love the bahn mi's here.
Enjoyed a grilled chicken sandwich with spring rolls. I took home 2 hot dog/cheese breads. Delicious! Good Vietnamese food. Comfortable waiting and eat-in atmosphere.

Lovely little coffee shop / lunch spot! The spring rolls were tasty and perfectly fried - not greasy or too doughy. Really enjoyed the Vietnamese coffee too! The place is beautifully decorated and there's a good amount of seating. Can't wait to go back and try their pasties
The BEST bahn mi, great coffee, yummy buns & the sweetest couple.

I just love these guys! They are so warm and friendly and their many treats are scrumptious! My real go-to drink is the iced Vietna.ese coffee, but my wife goes for the iced peach blossom tea! Good choices all!!!
This is a great little spot. The meatballs bahn mi is my favorite. Pastries are tasty and the Thai tea latte is awesome.
Fantastic fresh bread and wonderful flavors!
My favorite spot!! Please try the beef bulgolgi buns and crispy pork bahn mi. They're my go to's! I cant stop going to this place, they never dissapoint
A great restaurant! The service is amazing and the food is delicious. The grilled pork banh mi and the Vietnamese coffee was the best.

Wonderful service and very attentive/ informative

Gave me some great recommendations
I really liked the The grilled pork banh mi and the classic Vietnamese coffee would recommend best in town !!!
Relaxed atmosphere, great pastries, unique teas and coffee! The staff are friendly and the food is great. This place is a little hidden away, but a gem in Charlotte.

Honestly, I had no idea we had a banh mi & coffee shop that opened at 7 am. Not only was the food delicious, service quick, but the atmosphere is perfect. I get the coffee lofi jazz sorta vibe from this place. Which if you are like me is right up your alley to feeling good, happy, motivated, and maybe a little hungry.  Couldn't expected any better from anywhere else.

Edit: I mentioned the food was tasty, but I didn't do what this bulgogi deserves. This is hands down the best bulgogi banh mi I have had...not just charltote I'm including LA, Atlanta, and Miami. I haven't tried it all, but I can say this was 10/10. So tender and flavorful...perfect.
soooooo yum!!
Great local coffee shop and bakery. Want to go back and try the banh mi sandwich
I loved the taro latte with oat milk. It was very unique and delicious. I look forward to trying their banh mi sometime on their homemade bread.
Authentic Vietnamese banh mi and coffee! They were so kind and generous. Definitely worth the drive.

The best cappuccino I've ever had!  It was made with almond milk and he didn't bat an eye at my order.  (I'm ususally told that it doesn't work with almond milk).  I savored the large cup while I worked and brought a group with me a couple days later who loved it, too!
Really good bahmi sandwiches, very good baked goods, wonderful Vietnamese coffee

HIGHLY highly highly recommended: I lived for years in DC and NYC, and very rarely found a Banh Mi sandwich this good; and in addition, the baked/sweet items are really wonderful (and if you have kids: great place to take them!). It's also a very nice space (lovely decor and ambience); it happens to be quite affordable; the food is super-fresh, from the baguettes to the preparation; and the young folks who run the place are really friendly and pleasant ....  In short: This is a really wonderful place in every aspect, a great addition to our community!
Great bahn mi sandwichs!!!
Best bahn mi in town!! So fresh! I don't like it anywhere else. Pastries are so delicious and fresh. Reminds me of my mom's Eastern European recipes from scratch. Owners and staff are very welcoming.
Fantastic spot for Friday lunch.  #9 was delicious, tender beef with freshly chopped veggies. The freshly baked roll was amazing!
Sandwiches (pork and chicken) awesome!!
They make great coffee especially the matcha
Great coffee and great Banh mi!
This is a great local place to visit, sit, and have coffee with friends. Definitely recommend .. matcha lemonade, great choice..

BEST Banh Mi I've had since moving to Charlotte from California seven years ago. Not to mention the people behind the counter are genuinely kind and welcoming. I can't wait to come back to try out some of the sweet + savory in-house made pastries and drinks!
Super cute spot slinging Pure Intentions coffee with lots of vegan milk options!
Wonderful Healthy fresh/raw food selections. GREAT Customer Service!!!!

Always have a great experience but curious as to why everytime I've ordered the 12oz cappuccino, it'll fit in an 8oz measuring cup? What am I missing besides 4 oz?

Thanks for the response. Best if you remove 12 oz from your menu board and say small / large. I would have felt better thinking I was spending $5 on a large than realizing I was spending $5 for 8oz incl 2 oz of foam. 12oz  means 12oz and I prefer the cappuccino having more espresso than a latte.
Delicious. I had a grilled pork banh mi.
Best Bahn Mi selection, period! Owners are very nice and friendly and make for a great overall experience.
I absolutely love this place. The atmosphere is great and the food and Vietnamese coffee are even better!

I've gotten Banh Mi and the Vietnamese iced coffee here a couple times and it's always been great food. The sandwiches are really good along with their coffee. They offer bakery items as well so I'll have to try that next visit, but overall it's a very good Banh Mi restaurant. Good customer service and everybody is very friendly here.
Fresh bread makes the bahn mi, and their bread is fresh every morning. My wife always gets the egg bahn mi, but I try different ones every time. I had the tofu most recently. It was perfectly crispy.
Love this little spot for its great ambience, wonderful coffee and amazing fresh baked bread!
Great little spot. Crispy pork belly was amazing and the bread was toasted to perfection. My girlfriend really enjoyed the food....and she doesn't like anything!!!

I got the grilled pork Bahn Mi and it was better than any I've had in Charlotte yet. The bread was crunchy but not painfully so, the pork was really good and i almost wanted more veggies. I'm gonna try the pastries next time!

220C Banh Mi & Coffee in Matthews. Great service and Banh Mi! I got #2 and #5, love it. The baguettes are made on site! It was Sunday morning at 7am ish and they are the only shop that's open, 2 thumbs up for their hard work . Support small business!!
Best Bahn Mi my wife and I have ever had!
Great food + amazing service = Winwin!!
I go here all the time for lunch and it's amazing everytime. The staff are super awesome. Definitely recommend checking this out
The banh mi is great, especially the bulgogi and grilled pork ones. The pork belly banh mi is mid and the other baked goods are meh. Coffee is nice. They also give free points for reviews
Great coffee and bahn mi.
Everyone in our group enjoyed their lunch here. I think the #5 (Heo Quay - Crispy Pork) was the best
Great Banh Mi sandwiches and sweets.
LOVE this place! Definitely one of my go-tos. Food is great and the staff is amazing. Highly recommend!
Local hidden gem for really good coffee. Please stop by to support this community business & their owners!
The BEST banh mi I've tried so far. I'll be back!
Honestly the best banh mi I've had in Charlotte! The bread is freshly made and you can definitely tell

Thank you guys!
Meatball sandwiches and coffee were delicious!!
The bread on the Banh Mi is next level

So I went here on yesterday doing a door dash delivery and while I was there I looked around and saw how neat this place was. So today I decided to come back and try the food myself and I must say it was absolutely delicious and fresh, I would recommend this place to anyone!!!
Best Bahn Mi I've ever had. Delicious coffee. Nice people!
Fresh bread and great coffee!!
Great Bahn Mi, awesome bread, friendly service... I wish they'd include a little heat with the veggies, like a pepper of some sort... I'll definitely be back!

This place is great! Family shop, the people are so nice. Good value-  the food is fresh, crusty bread baked on site. Highly recommend. We will stop here regularly after running errands on Monroe Rd. The app is a nice touch. Plenty of seating inside.
Check out this cute gem!  Great food and coffee, charming atmosphere, and wonderful customer service!  Can't wait to go again!
Wow, service was excellent, I received some knowledge about Vietnamese food and it is really good! Yum, thanks
Tried the crispy pork belly banh mi..Fantastic..can't beat the homemade baguettes
Best Banh Mi in the city right now
The sandwich was amazing!

Fantastic food and coffee! My family and I have tried several sandwiches and bakery items and have not been disappointed. The owners are so friendly and very welcoming as well. I tell all my friends about this place. Give it a try next time you're hungry.
What a cute place! Delicious Thai iced coffee and baked goods. Can't wait to come back and try a Bahn Mi sandwich

The atmosphere is nice. Coffee and sweets are the best in charlotte. We are so fortunate to have a great coffee shop open until late. The owners are so hospitable and always greet us with smile. We come here at least 3 days a week. We bring 3 kids and they love to eat their cinnamon rolls and chocolate pastries. Banmi are so good and they offer great options of both chicken and pork. Such a great! Love this place.
Great Vietnamese iced coffee!!
The fantastic food matches the fantastic service! Super fresh ingredients, nice selection. Don't forget to follow up with a delicious pastry and coffee if you have room after the sandwich.

My son and I were craving a banh mi sammie and I had heard that this place makes very good ones, and brother were they GREAT!!! Really had some very fresh tasting ingredients, great taste with all if the pickled carrots, Daikon and cilantro. I got the traditional thin slices of pork and my son got the pork belly one. Both were superb, tried to split half with him but he said, No, it was too good. Will get the pork belly next time. Had several more to choose from and a good selection of Vietnamese coffees! If you like banh mi sandwiches, ya gotta give this place a try!
Food was great! Tried 4 sandwiches and all were good
This place is SO good. Amazing food and delicious Thai tea and a great vibe inside

The food was amazing.. Got the pork banh mi, the Bread was super fresh, good quality in everything.

Definitely worth coming. The atmosphere was super cozy
Great meatball banh mi, pastries are so good as well. I love the vibe and the decors as well. Recommend 100%
We tried their pastries and latte. They were tasty and fresh! Nice atmosphere, very clean and friendly service. Highly recommended!
Everything was amazing. The beef, the vegetables, the sauce and especially the bread. Really nice ambiance too. 5 Stars
Great food and very nice staff
Great service, comfortable cozy seating, delicious vegan tofu sandwich and great coffee. I had an espresso and a drip, and my wife enjoyed her oat milk Thai tea latte.
Absolutely loved this place. I got the Bulgogi sandwich, garlic herb and cream cheese pastry with a Vietnamese coffee. So delicious. Affordable prices and the servers were so very nice.
Amazing food, pastries and coffee, will be back every time we are in the area.
Great food and service.  Banh Mi on point
Great banh mi & a cozy little spot. I stopped in after an appointment at a neighboring business and wasn't disappointed
BEST BANH MI IN TOWN, NO WAIT, I MEANT, EVER!!!! ITS LIKE LIGHTNING IN A BOTTLE, INSTANT CLASSIC!!!
Great sandwiches and coffee

Everything we tried was delicious, the coffees were fantastic, and the staff are all very friendly. You can tell they really care about every detail here. This is a rare gem of a spot in Matthews and we are so glad they're here! Already looking forward to our next visit.
The bread is fresh baked and so flaky. I had the pork sandwich which did not lack any flavor unlike so many other places.
Yummy pork sandwich I didn't put any dressing on it.  They bake there own bread very healthy & subtle taste!
Absolutely delicious Banh mi sandwiches, chocolate hazelnut buns, and Vietnamese coffee, and friendly staff. Wish they were open later for cravings!
Incredible little spot. Love the savory pastries and Vietnamese iced coffee. Super friendly staff and tight down the street from us. Incredible addition to the east side!
The best banh mi I have had hands down. Delicious!
Best banh mi in Charlotte area hands down.
Food sucks owner is a scam shut it down
That grilled pork Banh mi is the best banh mi I've ever had in Charlotte.  Legit!
This little cafe serves up an above average banh mi sandwich. It's a good-sized sandwich on house made bread.
Very yummy beef bulgogi buns and nice selection of bread. Their matcha latte is the best my husband and I ever had, even better than Starbuck's version.
Delicious sandwiches, coffee, and pastries. I'd go every day if I could!
Banh Mi and the hot dog pastry were both delicious. Really enjoyed the Vietnamese coffee as well.

Just found 220C and I'm so glad I did!! Cici and Alex were so nice. I got the taro latte  my sister got the iced peach blossom tea. Also got some butter sugar bites and 2 pastries, the chocolate hazelnut and taro coconut. I can't wait to visit again!

I met God in a Banh Mi today.
I swear they have a savant baking the bread here it was unreal.
If you dont go here and try one of their Banh Mi's, you are doing a disservice to yourself.
This is not an exaggeration, I am happier now than I was before the Banh Mi. And the sheer excitement I had from the smell alone? If I could rate higher I would, take all of my money!
Delicious Grilled Pork Sandwich

My husband and I love this Bahn Mi place! The owners are very friendly and the place overall is very warm and inviting. Their baked goods and coffee are excellent, but their Bahn Mi is the star of the show! Its delicious. 10 stars. Support this local business!
